job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: we are looking for an experienced and selfmotivated machine learning engineer to join the data services team at anvyl you will collaborate with skilled designers data scientists and data engineers to deliver machine learning products for modern supply chains managed on anvyl you should demonstrate a deep understanding of statistics and applied machine learning curiosity data fluency and a collaborative work ethicltbrgtltbrgtwhat youll doltbrgtltulgtltligtbuild products that unlock supply chain insights using data scienceltligtltligtdevelop machine learning models and pipelines for research and productionltligtltligtbuild robust lasting and scalable productsltligtltligtcreate models which help drive value for users and our companyltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtthis is a remote positionltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtrequirementsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwhat wed love to seeltbrgtltulgtltligtyou have or more years of experience with a degree in computer science artificial intelligence machine learning or related fieldltligtltligtyou have experience in developing machine learning models such as classificationregression models nlp models and deep learning models with a focus on productionizing those models into product featuresltligtltligtyou have experience with data processing feature development and model optimizationltligtltligtyou have a solid understanding of statistics such as forecasting time series hypothesis testing classification clustering or regression analysis and how to apply that knowledge in understanding and evaluating machine learning modelsltligtltligtyou have data wrangling skills and can easily handle complex datasets using sql including complex joinsltligtltligtyou are familiar with pythons math science and data libraries including pandas numpy scipy and nltkltligtltligtyou have worked with cloud based data warehouse technology such as bigquery and amazon redshiftltligtltligtyou have at least some experience with largescale data processing and distributed systems such as bigqueryredshift sparkdaskltligtltligtyou are comfortable owning your project timelines prioritizing tasks with user and business impact in mind assessing speedprecision tradeoffs and proactively communicating project statuses to stakeholders and teammatesltligtltligtyou work well collaboratively both in a technical and crossfunctional contextltligtltligtyou are curious and excited to learn new methods approaches and perspectives and are eager to investigate interesting trends in the dataltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtexample projects you could work on at anvylltbrgtltulgtltligtdevelop machine learning models to identify supply chain risksltligtltligtdevelop nlp models to unpack communications between brands and suppliersltligtltligtdiscover and integrate data from external sources to form the foundation of a new data productltligtltligtdesign workflows and analysis tools to streamline the development of new machine learning modelsltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtwhat we valueltbrgtltulgtltligtdesire to learn and grow ltligtltligtbias towards action ltligtltligtteamoriented attitude you derive joy from seeing others succeed ltligtltligtenthusiasm for and interest in how technology impacts the physical world we live inltligtltligtgreat restaurant recommendationsltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtbenefitsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwe are a team that believes in cooperation learning quality and putting our people and customers up front we are a small company offering large company benefits health dental and vision offerings k availability and many more perks we are a remote company and want to make sure our employees have the flexibility to do their work where they feel best and know that they can step away to recharge with our unlimited paid time awayltbrgtltbrgtwe are a diverse team spanning all professions cultures races gender and orientations our teammates are located across the country as well as in china giving us a truly global footprint we enjoy spending time together in person when especially if there is korean bbq or having a group brainstorming session on the next product innovationltbrgtltbrgt
